BugReport.BugName: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user
BugReport.Description: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new the user, hence unable to create a new user in the application
BugReport.StepsToReproduce: 1) Login into the Application 2) Navigate to the Users Menu 3) Filled out all the user information fields 4) Clicked on the ‘Save’ button 5) Seen an error page: ORA1090 Exception: Insert values Error 6) See the attached logs for more information (Attach more related to the bug..IF any) 7) Also see the attached screenshot of the error page
BugReport.ExpectedResult: On clicking the SAVE button, you should be prompted to a successful message: new user has been created successfully
